verses.text: Make a joyful noise unto the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, all ye lands.
Serve the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*with gladness: come before his presence with singing.
Know ye that the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*he isGod: it ishe thathath made us, and not we ourselves; we arehis people, and the sheep of his pasture.
Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, andinto his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, andbless his name.
For the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*isgood; his mercy iseverlasting; and his truth endurethto all generations.
